titleStmt.title: A common-councell holden in the chamber of the Guildhall of the city of London the 21 day of May, 1660
titleStmt.author: City of London (England). Court of Common Council.
Alleyne, Thomas, Sir, fl. 1660.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by James Flesher, printer to the honourable City of London,

notesStmt.note: At head of title: Aleyn Mayor.
"Ordered that the letter sent to His Majesty by this court in answer to His Majesties gracious letter and declaration be printed. Sadler."
Item at reel position 1700:35 identified as Wing E2901 (number cancelled).
Reproduction of originals in the Harvard University Library and Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
